title: JSHint
a
http://jshint.com/
is an open source tool which detects errors and potential problems in JavaScript code.

inline_content.Text: is an open source tool which detects errors and potential problems in JavaScript code.

title: To lint your JavaScript you have two options.

inline_content.Text: To lint your JavaScript you have two options.

title: Go to
JSHint.com
a
http://jshint.com/
and paste your code in there on line text editor.

inline_content.Text: and paste your code in there on line text editor.

title:
- Atom: [linter-jshint](https://github.com/AtomLinter/linter-jshint) (must have [Linter](https://github.com/steelbrain/linter) plugin installed)        
- Sublime Text: [JSHint Gutter](https://github.com/victorporof/Sublime-JSHint) and/or [Sublime Linter](https://github.com/SublimeLinter/SublimeLinter-for-ST2)
- Vim: [jshint.vim](https://github.com/walm/jshint.vim) or [jshint2.vim](https://github.com/Shutnik/jshint2.vim)    
- Visual Studio: [VSCode JSHint](https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode-jshint)

content_resolved.code:
- Atom: [linter-jshint](https://github.com/AtomLinter/linter-jshint) (must have [Linter](https://github.com/steelbrain/linter) plugin installed)        
- Sublime Text: [JSHint Gutter](https://github.com/victorporof/Sublime-JSHint) and/or [Sublime Linter](https://github.com/SublimeLinter/SublimeLinter-for-ST2)
- Vim: [jshint.vim](https://github.com/walm/jshint.vim) or [jshint2.vim](https://github.com/Shutnik/jshint2.vim)    
- Visual Studio: [VSCode JSHint](https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode-jshint)

title: A benefit of adding it to your IDE is that you can create a JSON configuration file named
.jshintrc
c
that will be used when linting your program. This is convent if you want to share configurations between projects.

inline_content.Text: A benefit of adding it to your IDE is that you can create a JSON configuration file named
that will be used when linting your program. This is convent if you want to share configurations between projects.

title: JSHint also allows configurations for specific lines/blocks of code

inline_content.Text: JSHint also allows configurations for specific lines/blocks of code

title: More configuration options are documented at http://jshint.com/docs/options/

inline_content.Text: More configuration options are documented at http://jshint.com/docs/options/
